streams.subtitle: Manage your livestream sources

streams.regenerateConfirm: Regenerate stream key for "{name}"? The old key will stop working.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure system settings
settings.autoDetectDesc: Automatically use LAN (Ethernet) first, then WiFi
settings.lanModeDesc: QR codes use local IP - for devices on same WiFi
settings.publicModeDesc: QR codes use public IP - for remote access via internet
settings.lanIpHelper: Local network IP address for devices on the same network
settings.publicIpHelper: Your public IP address for remote/internet access. Click Auto-Detect to find it automatically.
settings.hostnameHelper: Your domain name if you have one. This takes priority over public IP when set.
settings.qrCodeHelper: Configure the IP address used for QR codes and mobile device connections. The system will use LAN addresses only (192.168.x.x, 10.x.x.x) and filter out loopback (127.x.x.x) and Docker internal IPs.
settings.priorityHelper: The system will use the highest priority interface (Ethernet > WiFi)
settings.interfaceHelper: Click "Use This IP" to select an interface, or type a custom IP above
settings.dockerWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Docker container IP - not accessible from other devices
settings.noHostnameWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è No hostname or public IP set - will fallback to LAN IP
settings.savedSuccess: Settings saved successfully! Network IP changes will apply to QR codes immediately when you reopen them.
settings.publicIpDetectFailed: Could not detect public IP. Please enter manually.
settings.publicIpDetectError: Failed to detect public IP. Please check your internet connection.

about.title: Nyon Livestream Server
about.subtitle: Low-Latency Streaming Platform
about.betaNotice: This is a beta version. The project is under active development. Version 1.0.0 will be released once all core features are stable and thoroughly tested.
about.author: Author
about.nonProfitDesc: Free and open-source software for the community
about.description: Nyon Livestream Server is a lightweight, low-latency streaming platform designed specifically for Raspberry Pi and similar ARM-based devices. It enables you to ingest video streams from cameras, drones, or mobile devices and distribute them with minimal delay.
about.lowLatencyDesc: Sub-second streaming delay using HTTP-FLV and optimized SRS configuration
about.multipleProtocolsDesc: RTMP and SRT for publishing, HTTP-FLV for playback
about.resourceEfficientDesc: Relay-only mode uses minimal CPU and memory
about.webManagementDesc: Modern React-based dashboard for stream management
about.dualNetworkDesc: LAN and Public IP access with automatic detection
about.sessionMonitoringDesc: Real-time viewer tracking and bandwidth monitoring
about.roadmapItem1: Complete stability testing on Raspberry Pi 3/4/5
about.contactDesc: This is a community-driven project. If you encounter issues, have feature requests, or want to contribute, please reach out:
about.tagline: Built with passion for the maker community. Enjoy streaming!
about.footerLove: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the Raspberry Pi community
